This directory includes third-party software that wad2image needs.

omg - This is Devin Acker's fork of Omgifol as of 2017-04-30, which is GIT
      commit 582da975f0. It can be found at 
      https://github.com/devinacker/omgifol . It's covered by the MIT license,
      which is compatible with wad2image's GPLv2+ license.
